name: Eryn
greetingText: Hope you have a great day!
wishText: May Allah bless you with a long life! this is my sincere prayer to Allah on your birthday. Happy Birthday ;)
text3: Namun, disebabkan aku ni genius dan pintar.
text4: Aku dapat, Idea dan nak buat sedikit
replayText: atau click, kalau nak ulang dan terus ulang sampai abis keje
